title: The Real Reason Why The Media Wants to Stop the Trump Rally (Ep 1279)
description:
In this episode I address the real reason that the liberal media wants to stop the Trump rally. I also address the dreadful Supreme Court immigration ruling and why it could give the President an advantage when leaving office. Finally, I address the latest efforts by Twitter to sabotage the Trump campaign. 

News Picks:


The liberal media’s hypocrisy on protests, versus Trump rallies is a sight to see.


They will do anything to stop President Trump from holding his rally this weekend. 


Twitter escalates their war on President Trump. 

Facebook removes a Trump campaign ad.

Is China preparing for a devastating EMP attack?


Those Kente cloths the Democrats wore in their kneeling protest have ties to the African slave trade.

The Supreme Court’s DACA ruling is outrageous.
